snippet: The Wallace Foundation is beginning a six-year effort to help dance companies, opera troupes, orchestras and theaters develop new audience-building programs.
abstract: The Wallace Foundation is beginning a six-year effort to help dance companies, opera troupes, orchestras and theaters develop new audience-building programs.

headline.main: $52 Million Push to Help Arts Institutions Find New Audiences
headline.print_headline: $52 Million Push to Help the Arts Reach a New Crowd
